modName: Yautja Follower Pack for Predators The Lost Tribes
summary: It adds Three New Predator Followers To The Predator Lost Tribes Mod
descriptionHtml:
[center]This is My First yautja Follower Mod for Roland113's Mod:
PREDATORS THE LOST TRIBES

IT Adds Three Yautja Followers that Are Located in the Training Room in the Derelict Ship.
You can Use EFF for Multiple Followers
The three Yautja NPC's Are:
Reyinke: An Elite Yautja who is the Leader of Two Blooded Yautja's and He's Taller than The Two.
Na'do-Va: A Blooded Yautja Who Follows his Elite Leader's Footsteps To the Thrill of The Hunt
Tsuan-Zhou: A Blooded Yautja who is Na'do-Va's Brother who too Follows His Elite Leader's Footsteps To the Thrill of the Hunt.

The Mods You Need:
[i]Immersive armors[/i]
[i]Predators the Lost Tribes Mod + Tweak from LoversLab.com[/i]
[i]DragonBone Barbarian Male[/i]

CREDITS:
Roland113 - PREDATORS The Lost Tribes
Shockero - Dragonbone Barbarian Armor - Male Edition
Hothtrooper44 - Immersive Armors[/center]
author: JurassicYautja
